name: Pre-Sales Engineer - Web Load Testing Product
description:
Company Overview:

Our company is a leading provider of web load testing solutions to enterprise-level clients. We specialize in delivering high-quality, performance-driven tools that enable our clients to deliver a seamless digital experience to their users. Our product is trusted by some of the world's largest brands, and we are looking for a dynamic and motivated Pre-Sales Engineer to join our team.

Job Overview:

As a Pre-Sales Engineer, you will be responsible for helping to drive the growth of our web load testing product by supporting our sales team in the pre-sales process. You will work closely with our sales representatives and technical team to identify client needs, prepare and deliver product demonstrations, and provide technical guidance to clients.

Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with sales representatives to identify client needs and recommend appropriate product solutions.
  • Deliver product demonstrations and technical presentations to prospective clients, highlighting the product's key features and benefits.
  • Conduct technical discovery sessions with clients to gather information about their infrastructure, performance goals, and testing requirements.
  • Work closely with our technical team to provide customized solutions to clients.
  • Participate in product training sessions to stay up-to-date on new features and capabilities.
  • Help prepare and deliver proposals, RFP responses, and other sales-related documentation.

Qualifications:

  • English — C2 — Proficiency or better
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Experience in a Pre-Sales Engineer role, ideally within the web load testing space.
  • Strong technical skills and understanding of web applications and architecture.
  • Experience with load testing tools such as JMeter, Gatling, LoadRunner, or similar.
  • Ability to work collaboratively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

If you are a self-starter who is passionate about web load testing and enjoys working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, we want to hear from you. We offer a competitive salary, comprehensive benefits package, and opportunities for professional growth and development.
